ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a short note for those of you that are afraid of getting the wrong specialization above 51. There is a way of resetting them. I do not remember exactly
ygData.messageBody:
Just a short note for those of you that are afraid of getting the "wrong"
specialization above 51.

There is a way of resetting them. I do not remember exactly how. But it is
something with a tiny NPC in Cazic Thule I think. And it costs something
like an expensive gem. I have heard it truncates them all to 49. Not sure of
the details. Should be pretty common knowledge though.

(This has been a big discussion amongst Magicians. Turned out to be
Evocation up to lvl 45 then Conjuration.)

Renden, Enchanter (on Tunare)
Also Zaltil, Magician (on Innoruuk)
